sources.data_found: Klone Hardware Documentation: Lists available GPU node types including 'gpu-a100-40g', 'gpu-a100-80g', 'gpu-a40', 'gpu-l40', and 'gpu-v100'.
PhD Program Overview: Mentions the approximate size of the doctoral program as 'approx 500 students'.
Hyak Scheduling/Resources: Confirms active partitions for A100, A40, L40, and V100 nodes.
Mentions Hyak and Tillicum GPU clusters.
Research Computing Club maintains a large account on Hyak's Klone cluster.
Lists node costs and configs: 2 x L40 GPUs, 2 x H50, 2 x H100 (pending).
Mentions GPU slices costs (L40S, H200) and Tillicum cluster.
Klone nodes run Rocky 8 Linux and currently hosts over 18,000 compute cores.
GPU driver updates.
Undergrad enrollment 1,996 in 2021.
549 Total Graduate Students.
PhD program stats.
Admissions stats.
300 full-time graduate students in Ph.D. program.
Degree stats.
Degree stats.
Hyak Klone sinfo -s partition node totals and GPU counts per node.
Tillicum architecture: 24 Dell XE9680 servers; 192 NVIDIA H200 GPUs.
Eichler Lab cluster: 16 A100 and 2 V100 GPUs.
Reference to 2,200+ undergraduate majors.

student_data.notes: Undergraduate count (2,200+) sourced from 2024-2025 Allen School fact sheet. Graduate count (~1,000) sourced from Allen School 'Facts' page via Gemini. PhD count (~500) derived from program overview, though some sources list 300 full-time.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Found in Hyak partitions (15 nodes x 8 GPUs)

gpu_resources.notes: Major resources split between 'Hyak' (Klone) and 'Tillicum' clusters. Tillicum architecture confirms 192 H200 SXM GPUs. A100 counts are a mix of specific partition data (Hyak) and estimates based on total node capacity in the condo model; higher estimates (140 80GB, 120 40GB) used to account for private condo nodes not visible in public partition lists. A40 (256), L40S (144), and A6000 (152) counts derived from specific Slurm partition node totals.

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini models. High confidence in H200 count due to specific architecture documentation for the Tillicum cluster. Student counts reflect the most recent 2024/2025 data available.
validation_notes: No changes made. All resources appear to be university-owned and student data is complete.
